posts.title: Ajax requests in React
posts.body: You can use Fetch or Axios to perform Ajax requests. In React, you usually fire these requests from componentDidMount and/or componentDidUpdate.

posts.title: React Lifecycle
posts.body: The three main lifecycle methods are componentDidMount, componentWillUnmount and componentDidUpdate.

posts.title: React Conf 2019
posts.body: If you have 9 hours to spend, here's the full video of Day 1: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RCiccdQObpo.

posts.title: React Router v5
posts.body: The React Router team announced the release of version 5.0 in March 2019. Then version 5.1 with hooks was released in September 2019. Here's the blog announcement: https://reacttraining.com/blog/react-router-v5-1/
